messages.title: STOP THE TORY CRISIS IN OUR NHS AND SOCIAL CARE
messages.content: Our NHS has just had its worst winter ever. Patients are experiencing a crisis every day...

messages.title: Campaigning against education cuts
messages.content: Under Labour our local schools improved dramatically but we are now threatened with major cuts...

messages.title: Tory ministers continue to fail rail passengers across Dulwich and West Norwood
messages.content: Over the past year, residents across Dulwich and West Norwood have been let down by a privatised rail system...

messages.title: Good mental health support is vital for everyone in our local community
messages.content: Good mental health support is vital for all of us when we need it, but for too many local people the support they need has simply not been there in recent years...

messages.title: Tackling air pollution
messages.content: The Tory government has been comprehensively failing to tackle air pollution, preferring to listen to car manufacturers rather than to the urgent health needs of the population...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Helen Hayes criticizes Tory-induced crisis and calls for comprehensive support.
Campaign against education cuts threatening local schools.
Criticism of the privatised rail system and calls for better services.
Calls for improved mental health support and services.
Criticism of the Tory government's inaction on air pollution.

issues.health: STOP THE TORY CRISIS IN OUR NHS AND SOCIAL CARE
issues.transport: Tory ministers continue to fail rail passengers

community.content: Re-open Camberwell station, Action on homelessness, Royal Mail delivery office closures, Rates chaos for local businesses

politicalExperience.achievements: Campaigning on key issues such as NHS, education, and transportation.

contactInformation.address: Labour Party, 264 Rosendale Road, London SE24 9DL

images.caption: Helen Hayes with local NHS campaigners
With Mayor of London Sadiq Khan and local GLA member

examples: Thousands of mental health staff cut since 2010.
Each year 40,000 people die prematurely due to air pollution.
Good mental health support is vital for everyone in our local community.
Under the Tories, the proportion of NHS funding spent on mental health has continued to fall.
The Tory government has been comprehensively failing to tackle air pollution.
STOP THE TORY CRISIS IN OUR NHS AND SOCIAL CARE

personalStories.story: Helen Hayes has relentlessly called on the Tory government to intervene and to hand the running of our rail services to Transport for London.

examples: Tory ministers continue to fail rail passengers across Dulwich and West Norwood
STOP THE TORY CRISIS IN OUR NHS AND SOCIAL CARE
The Tory government has been comprehensively failing to tackle air pollution.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: Helen Hayes is a member of the All Party Parliamentary Group on Social Integration and a founding Member of the All Party Parliamentary Group on London.

examples: Working hard for Dulwich and West Norwood every day
